article_title: Thousands of Palestinians return to Khan Younis as IDF withdraws
sentence: On  Tuesday,  Israel  Defence  Forces  (IDF)  officials  said  more  than  150  gunmen  had  been  killed  during  the  week  long  offensive.

article_title: Thousands of Palestinians return to Khan Younis as IDF withdraws
sentence: But  the  Hamas-run  Gaza  media  office  said  at  least  250  Palestinians  were  killed  and  more  than  300  injured  during  the  fighting.

article_title: Thousands of Palestinians return to Khan Younis as IDF withdraws
sentence: On  Tuesday,  aid  workers  could  be  seen  in  the  streets  of  Khan  Younis  collecting  dead  bodies  and  wrapping  them  in  rugs,  before  transporting  them  to  morgues  around  the  city,  the  Reuters  news  agency  reported.

sentence: I  don't  know  whether  we  will  live  or  die,  but  it  is  all  for  the  sake  of  the  homeland,"  said  Etimad  Al-Masri.

sentence: Since  the  conflict  began  in  October  more  than  39,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed,  according  to  Gaza's  health  ministry.

article_title: Thousands of Palestinians return to Khan Younis as IDF withdraws
sentence: The  war  started  when  Hamas  attacked  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  around  1,200  people  and  taking  251  hostage.
